charges.charge_description: Did knowingly and intentionally distribute approximately 3 grams of a mixture or substance containing a concaine base (also known as crack cocaine) 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(C). Date of Offense: February 1, 2000. Penalty: Not more than 20 years imprisonment without probation, parole or suspended sentence, a fine of up to $1 million, at least 3 years SRT, $100 Special Assessment, and community restitution up to the amount of any fine imposed by the court. (1)

Did knowingly and intentionally distribute approximately 4 grams of a mixture or substance containing a cocaine base (also known as crack cocaine) 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(C). Date of Offense: February 11, 2000. Penalty: Not more than 20 years imprisonment without probation, parole or suspended sentence, a fine of up to $1 million, at least 3 years SRT, $100 Special Assessment, and community restitution up to the amount of any fine imposed by the court. (2)

Did knowingly and intentionally distribute approximately 5.10 grams of a mixture or substance containing a cocaine base (also known as crack cocaine) 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B) Date of Offense: February 14, 2000. Penalty: Not less than 5 years nor more than 40 years imprisonment without probation, parole or suspended sentence, a fine of up to $2 million, at least 4 years SRT, $100 Special Assessment, and community restitution up to the amount of any fine imposed by the court. (3)

Did knowingly and intentionally distribute approximately 5.10 grams of a mixture or substance containing a cocaine base (also known as crack cocaine) 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(B). Date of Offense: March 6, 2000. Penalty: Not less than 5 years nor more than 40 years imprisonment without probation, parole or suspended sentence, a fine of up to $2 million, at least 4 years SRT, $100 Special Assessment and community restitution up to the amount of any fine imposed by the court. (4)
